name: Jerry Paint
description:
HOW TO PLAY: Just paint. Have fun! (Quick note: when you start, try moving your mouse to the pencil to start painting!)

CREDITS: Credits to Nintendo for the music, all art is by me (except for the cat which is Scratch's mascot and owned by the Scratch Team)

EXTRA INFO: I dont think this will work on mobile, but you can give it a try!

CURRENT VERSION: 1.7.3
